data.host: Corporate Galaxy, Re! Imagine, Star Training Network
data.name: India post COVID-19 - Re designing the built environment for tomorrow and beyond
data.summary:
How will we suddenly cope with a globalized world which will be suddenly conscious of the risk of proximity ?
How do we cut across our apprehensions to build a new world which will be healthy and ahead of the curve ?
How do we deal with the shadow of COVID 19 for a long time to come ?
What are the scenarios the world will wake up to ?
Who will be the winners of a new world ?
The premise of globalization will be turned on its head.
What will 2022 look like ?
